name: Group6 - Quack quack panic attack!
description:
Manager, Programmer: Tom Gibbs

Designers: Fraser King, Daniel Marsh, Jack Massey

***Android build!***

Game:

The first turn of the game is decided by the player who records the highest scoring tap. [Green power meter = best, Red power meter = worst].

The background colour represents the player turn. 

Knock your opponent off the screen!

Time the tap in the green zone for a stronger hit. Time a tap in the red zone for a weaker hit.
